resources.string: Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions.
Please enable location services to allow GPS tracking
You have unanswered questions in pages

PRO-CTCAE is a patient-reported outcome measure developed to evaluate symptomatic toxicity in patients on cancer clinical trials.
PRO-CTCAE responses are scored from 0 to 4, please answer all questions before submitting the questionnaire.
